name: KnightDefender.exe
description:
This is our entry for Blackthornprod's #3 Game Jam.

Play as an Anti-Virus, deleting the corrupted files on you PC.

The less enemies... the more storage space!

Framerates should drop lower as more storage is being filled up.

Credits:

Ducky - Project Manager, Artist, Programmer

Kanha - Programmer, SFX

Jarrett - Artist

JJ - Music, SFX
